verses.roman:
āji āmi āchilāṅa uṭhāiluṅ prabhure
vṛndāvane ḍubena yadi, ke uṭhābe tāṅre?

synonyms: āji—today; āmi—I; āchilāṅa—was present; uṭhāiluṅ—raised; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vṛndāvane—in Vṛndāvana; ḍubena yadi—if He drowns; ke uṭhābe tāṅre—who will raise Him.
translation: Balabhadra Bhaṭṭācārya said, "Since I was present today, it was possible for me to pull the Lord up. However, if He starts to drown at Vṛndāvana, who will help Him?
